title: Invisible Mundo Cleavers
body: In my last game i vs'ed a Mundo, his' animation and sound of his' cleavers work per as usual, but myself and my brother couldn't see the cleavers, the sounds of throwing and hitting working as well. IS this just me and my brother, or is this some hardware/software malfunction?

replies.body:
This is a bug in the game, and Riot are like, "Lols lets leave it for ze giggles!" so really nothing can be done about it.

It shouldn't happen every game, though. Just think of it like an extra challenge.
